title: I think I’m done
author: VD
content_html:
Oh, not done-done. There will be any amount of fiddling, tweaking and going back and forth with the publisher, but the first draft of TIA is basically complete, and, one hopes, reasonably coherent. I can definitely send it off Monday, anyhow, which is a relief.

Strangely anti-climactic, to be honest, but I’m having a Disaronno-laced espresso to celebrate anyhow.
content_text:
Oh, not done-done.  There will be any amount of fiddling, tweaking and going back and forth with the publisher, but the first draft of TIA is basically complete, and, one hopes, reasonably coherent.  I can definitely send it off Monday, anyhow, which is a relief.
Strangely anti-climactic, to be honest, but I’m having a Disaronno-laced espresso to celebrate anyhow.
